Package VMF

Class FriedRiceVM

java.lang.Object
VMF.VendingMachine
VMF.FriedRiceVM
public class FriedRiceVM extends VendingMachine
The VendingMachineFactory.FriedRiceVM class represents a special vending machine for selling fried rice. It extends the VendingMachine class and provides additional functionality for managing fried rice slots.

  • Method Details

    • passSlotType

      public void passSlotType(FrmSlot selectedSlot, String slotType)
      Passes the slot type to the selected slot and keeps track of the number of slots occupied by each type.
      Parameters:
      selectedSlot - the selected slot to set the slot type
      slotType - the type of the slot (e.g., "Rice", "Meat", "Egg", or "Condiments")

    • getSlotTypeOccupied

    • buySpecialItem

      public void buySpecialItem(ArrayList<FrmSlot> slotsToBuy, ArrayList<Float> collected)

      Parameters:
